price: Nokorε sε deε yahyε mo ho bͻ no reba ampa; na monntumi nnnsi ho kwan.
arabic: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَأٓتٖۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna mā tūʿadūna laātin wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
